CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 呼吸；气息；一次呼吸的空气；（空气的）微微流动；拂动；微量；迹象

synonym.mean: 呼吸，气息；一口气，一次；瞬间，瞬息；微风；迹象；无声音，气音

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
呼吸（breath的过去式和过去分词）
呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂
呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说

word_group.brief_definition: 少量的新鲜空气；短暂的时间内呼吸到的新鲜空气；带来新鲜感的变化
生命中不可缺少的东西

bilingual.source: He held his breath in wonder and excitement.
bilingual.target: 他屏住呼吸，充满了惊奇和兴奋。

bilingual.source: Count to ten and take a deep breath.
You should take a deep breath and count to ten.
bilingual.target: 你应该深呼吸并数到十。

bilingual.source: He'd held his breath and imagined the whole sea emptying onto the shore.
bilingual.target: 他屏住呼吸，想象整个海洋倾泻到岸上。

bilingual.source: I need to hld my breath underwater.
bilingual.target: 我需要在水下屏住呼吸。

bilingual.source: The cold air made his breath visible.
bilingual.target: 冷空气使他的呼吸可见。

bilingual.source: He held his breath while diving underwater.
bilingual.target: 他在潜水时屏住了呼吸。

bilingual.source: Let's go to the park to take a fresh breath.
bilingual.target: 我们去公园呼吸新鲜空气吧。

list.abstract: 《Breath》又名《숨소리》《呼吸》《息の音》，是태연（泰妍）、종현（JONGHYUN）演唱的一首韩语版流行歌曲，中文版由첸（Chen）、张力尹演唱，김태성、장연정、최현준作词，김태성、최현준作曲，日文版由최강창민（沈昌珉）、크리스탈（Krystal）演唱，这首歌由SM Entertainm发行于2014年2月13日，收录在专辑《S.M. THE BALLAD Vol.2 Breath》中。
breath（日文︰ブレス）是宝可梦：我们的故事的片尾曲，由色情涂鸦演唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep breath, deep breath, deep breath!
yingyinNormal.zh: 深呼吸深呼吸...

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, Mommies, take a nice deep cleansing breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各位妈妈们，请深呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: And you thought a drive would be good for me. A breath of fresh air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得出去兜风会对我有好处，呼吸新鲜空气。

yingyinNormal.en: So. Pop quiz. Mr. Weatherly complains of chest pain and shortness of breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 突击考试，威瑟利先生称自己胸口疼痛，呼吸急促。

yingyinNormal.en: Decreased breath sounds on the right. We need x-ray in here stat! Right away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 右边肺部的呼吸声减弱，我们这里需要个X光机！马上就来。

yingyinNormal.en: I had that child in my arms. I could feel her breath on me, but I couldn't look down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我抱着那孩子。我能感觉到她的呼吸但却不敢往下看。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, here we go. Time for these babies to go get milked. All right, I'm holding my breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们走吧，该挤奶了。好吧，我要屏住呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: Arms, take your last embrace. And, lips, oh, you the doors of breath, seal with a righteous kiss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 手臂，最后抱你一次，还有在你的双唇，呼吸之所，印下堂堂正正的一吻。

yingyinNormal.en: Besides, I don't need six hours of "Your hair is different. Why did you change your hair? I'm holding my breath until your hair grows back."
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且，我也不想听六个小时的"你的发型变了，你为什么换发型了？我要憋住呼吸到你头发长出来为止。"

yingyinNormal.en: Stand naturally. Not to step for a slunt, good posture will help you breath and speak easier and let your audience know that you're calm and control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 站姿自然站要有站相，站姿可以帮助你呼吸顺畅，演讲更轻松也可以让观众觉得你很冷静，且胸有成竹。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: I've been asked this question hundreds of times and I remember once, when I couldn't catch my breath and it felt like my chest was on fire, the nurse asked me to rate the pain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我被问了无数次。我记得有一次，我不能呼吸，我感到我的胸口有一团火在烧，护士问我有多疼。

yingyinNormal.en: If a potential mate has managed to pass all these tests, there's still one more: the infamous first kiss, a rich and complex exchange of tactile and chemical cues, such as the smell of one's breath, and the taste of their mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果有某个可能的对象通过这些检验，最后还有一项：恶名昭彰的初吻，初吻交换丰富而复杂的触觉及化学信号，像是呼吸的气味及嘴巴的味道。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep breath, Gaston. Deep breath. So why don't we just turn around, go back to Villeneuve? I'm sure Belle is at home, cooking up a lovely dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冷静，加斯顿。深呼吸。那么我们为什么不转过身去，回到维伦纽夫呢？我肯定贝儿在家，做了一顿丰盛的晚餐。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath. It's good to see honest conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，让我们作个深呼吸，有话好好说。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Manny, take a deep breath. Picture it going through the uprights.
yingyinNormal.zh: 曼尼，深呼吸，想象球垂直飞起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Kev. Deep breath, okay? Come on, man. First came. Me. And Dad said, "Gee."
yingyinNormal.zh: 小凯，深呼吸，好吗？来吧，兄弟，第一个，是我。爸爸说……“天哪”。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, everybody. Take a seat. Let's just take a breath before we start in on this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请吧, 各位,请坐,在我们开始前深呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: There we go, deep breath. Are you just trying to steal the pen? Is that what this is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，深呼吸，你该不是要偷这支笔吧？说中了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Um, start in with... What? You, too, Nancy. Here . Everybody, take a big, long breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开始... 什么啊 ？你也坐下，南希，每个人都深呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hey, come on, baby. I need you to take one big, deep breath for me, okay? Oh, that's good. All right. My vice is asthma. His is cocaine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，宝贝，深呼吸，好吗。很好，可以了。我的恶习是哮喘。他的恶习是可卡因。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 呼吸；生存；活着；注入活力；轻吹；说出；吐露；呈现出

word_family.mean: n. 气息；呼出（或吸入的）空气；呼吸；生命；微风；迹象；暗示；呼吸能力

examination_example.sentence: Stay alert to serious symptoms, such as chest pain, severe shortness of <highlight>breath</highlight> or dizziness, or faintness, and seek medical attention immediately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对严重症状保持警惕，如胸痛、严重气短、头晕或昏厥，并立即就医。

examination_example.sentence: Deep <highlight>breaths</highlight> can help, as can speaking more slowly and deliberately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 深呼吸会有所帮助，慢慢地、从容不迫地说话也会有所帮助。

word_usage.usage:
a breath of sth.意为“……的迹象”，如：
a breath of suspicion  一丝怀疑

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Physical symptoms include a racing heart or struggling to catch <highlight>breath</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生理症状包括心跳加速和呼吸困难。

examination_example.sentence: There is no point saying you run marathons if you are going to be out of <highlight>breath</highlight> arriving at the interview on the second floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你连爬两层楼来面试都累得气喘吁吁，那么你说你常跑马拉松就毫无意义了。

examination_example.sentence: But in the same <highlight>breath</highlight> they'll remind you that it is the most important decision of your life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但同时，他们又会提醒你这是你一生中最重要的决定。

direction_info.description:

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 适合吸入的；透气的
v. 呼吸；生存；活着；注入活力；轻吹；说出；吐露；呈现出
n. 呼吸；送气符号“‘”；不送气符号“’”

word_family.mean: n. 气息；呼出（或吸入的）空气；呼吸；生命；微风；迹象；暗示；呼吸能力

examination_example.sentence: Frank held his <highlight>breath</highlight> under the water to search for his ring in the swimming pool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克在水下屏住呼吸，在游泳池里寻找他的戒指。

examination_example.sentence: If you blow all of it off in one <highlight>breath</highlight>, your wish will come true!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你一口气把这一切都吹走，你的愿望就会实现！

examination_example.sentence: I held the flower up to my nose and took a deep <highlight>breath</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把花举到鼻子前，深吸了一口气。
